headline: There Will Be Blood. And It Will Be in Your Cheeks.
abstract: Some help — and commiseration — for all the heavy blushers out there.
lead_paragraph: Most horror stories have a lot of blood, but this one has a cruel and merciless amount. It has so much blood that tourniquets and perma-savior Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson are rendered useless because the blood in this story doesn’t spill out of our dying bodies in buckets and splash onto the cold tile floor like we wish it would.
